content: One paper accepted by ICML 2025 in Vancouver, Canada!
One paper accepted by IEEE-ITSC 2024 in Edmonton, Canada!
One paper accepted by T-IV. One paper accepted by CVPR 2024!
I start my PhD at TUM Chair of Robotics, Artificial Intelligence and Real time Systems!

links.text: Chair of Robotics, Artificial Intelligence and Real time Systems

content: Completed my M.Sc. thesis "Real-Time LiDAR-Based 3D Object Detection on the Highway" at TUM!
